scripts.dist-lin-deb32: build -l --config=buildscripts/debbuild32.yaml && mkdir -p ~/wallets/ && cp dist/*.deb ~/wallets/ && rm -r dist/*
scripts.dist-lin-deb64: build -l --config=buildscripts/debbuild64.yaml && mkdir -p ~/wallets/ && cp dist/*.deb ~/wallets/ && rm -r dist/*
scripts.dist-lin-tar32: build -l --config=buildscripts/tarbuild32.yaml && mkdir -p ~/wallets/ && cp dist/*.gz ~/wallets/ && rm -r dist/*
scripts.dist-lin-tar64: build -l --config=buildscripts/tarbuild64.yaml && mkdir -p ~/wallets/ && cp dist/*.gz ~/wallets/ && rm -r dist/*
scripts.dist-win-exe32: build -w --config=buildscripts/exebuild32.yaml && mkdir -p ~/wallets/ && cp dist/*.exe ~/wallets/ && rm -r dist/*
scripts.dist-win-exe64: build -w --config=buildscripts/exebuild64.yaml && mkdir -p ~/wallets/ && cp dist/*.exe ~/wallets/ && rm -r dist/*
scripts.dist-win-zip32: build -w --config=buildscripts/zipbuild32.yaml && mkdir -p ~/wallets/ && cp dist/*.zip ~/wallets/ && rm -r dist/*
scripts.dist-win-zip64: build -w --config=buildscripts/zipbuild64.yaml && mkdir -p ~/wallets/ && cp dist/*.zip ~/wallets/ && rm -r dist/*
